title.en:
The 'GitHub is Enough' Pitfall in AI-Driven Development
- The Importance of Backup Strategy

description.en: Learning from real data corruption in AI-collaborative development: Why GitHub alone is insufficient and the importance of local backups

excerpt.en: A real case of 38 articles data corruption in AI collaborative development. Learn from our experience why GitHub couldn't prevent it and how local backups became our savior, leading to a new backup strategy for the AI era.
